initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Plusgrowth Marketing Automation?
Plusgrowth Marketing Automation alleviates the burden of having to do all of the back-end work for promotional e-mail blasts. This can save large amounts of time for marketing profesionals.

What do you dislike about Plusgrowth Marketing Automation?
The Plusgrowth website is not the most user-friendly. Navigating the website can be a bit of a hassle, over-all the system does help marketers with email blasts.

What problems is Plusgrowth Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Plusgrowth is helping marketing professionals by taking away some of the hassles we are confronted with when we do promotion. This can save alot of time, and free you up to do more important tasks.
